subject: Coaches and Managers
Colleges and Universities
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Tim Pernetti, a Rutgers alumni, was also an executive vice president at CBS College Sports Network and a commentator on Rutgers’s football radio broadcasts.
snippet: Tim Pernetti, a Rutgers alumni, was also an executive vice president at CBS College Sports Network and a commentator on Rutgers’s football radio broadcasts.
